entry.title: Configure Static IP in Linux
entry.summary: Configure Static IP Address in Debian Open in your favorite text editor the file /etc/network/interfaces # This file describes the network interfaces available on your system # and how to activate them. For more information, see interfaces(5). source /etc/network/interfaces.d/* # The loopback network interface auto lo iface lo inet loopback # The primary network interface allow-hotplug ens...

entry.title: Mount NFS share on Debian
entry.summary: This page has been originally created by “Karim Buzdar” found on “Linuxhint-How to Mount NFS share on Debian 10(https://linuxhint.com/mount_nfs_share_debian)”. I want to thank him for the contribution. Mount NFS share on Debian The network file system NFS is an efficient way of sharing files and directories to other machines in a network.
